name: Frozen Bubble (itch)
description:
Frozen Bubble is a free and open source clone of Puzzle Bubble, where you can battle with up to 4 opponents online

This game has reached adulthood as it was conceived by Guillaume Cottenceau in 2001. This itch.io version was made to develop an hidden part of the game : its backend server.

Safety third

This is an early version with known bugs. Server may crash at any time

How to play

Select an open game in the first screen (You can't join a running game -red color- or a game with 5 players). The first player to join a game becomes its owner. This player can launch the game as soon as -at least- another player joined.

Z/C to turn Left/Right (W/C on french keyboards), S to fire

Or just use arrows
